eng: The Major League Baseball's preseason is also known as spring training. All MLB teams maintain a spring-training base in Arizona or Florida. The teams in Arizona make up the Cactus League, while the teams in Florida play in the Grapefruit League. Each team plays about 30 preseason games against other MLB teams. They may also play exhibitions against a local college team or a minor-league team from their farm system. Some days feature the team playing two games with two different rosters evenly divided up, which are known as "split-squad" games.
slo: Predizbor lige Major League Baseball je znan tudi kot spomladansko usposabljanje. Vse ekipe imajo v Arizoni ali Floridi spomladi trening. Moštva v Arizoni sestavljajo Cactus League, medtem ko ekipe na Floridi igrajo v ligi Grapefruit League. Vsaka ekipa igra približno 30 predčasnih iger proti drugim ekipam MLB. Prav tako lahko igrajo razstave proti lokalni kolegijski ekipi ali ekipi mladoletne lige iz njihovega kmetijskega sistema. Nekateri dnevi imajo ekipo, ki igra dve igri z dvema različnima seznamoma enakomerno razdeljenih, ki so znani kot „razcepljene“ igre.

eng: Which states do MLB teams do spring training in?
slo: V katerih državah se ekipe MLB udeležijo spomladanskega usposabljanja?

eng: Arizona or Florida
slo: Arizona ali Florida

eng: What is the MLB preseason league in Arizona called?
slo: Kako se imenuje MLB predzazonska liga v Arizoni?

eng: Cactus League
slo: Kaktus liga

eng: What is the MLB preseason league in Florida called?
slo: Kako se imenuje MLB predzazonska liga na Floridi?

eng: Grapefruit League
slo: Liga grenivk

eng: How many preseason games does each MLB team play?
slo: Koliko predzasezonskih iger ima vsaka ekipa MLB?

eng: about 30
slo: približno 30

eng: What is it called when an MLB team plays two preseason games in one day with different rosters?
slo: Kako se imenuje, ko MLB ekipa igra dve predizhodni igri v enem dnevu z različnimi seznami?

eng: "split-squad" games
slo: „split-squad“ igre

eng: In the early 21st century the Cypriot economy has diversified and become prosperous. However, in 2012 it became affected by the Eurozone financial and banking crisis. In June 2012, the Cypriot government announced it would need €1.8 billion in foreign aid to support the Cyprus Popular Bank, and this was followed by Fitch downgrading Cyprus's credit rating to junk status. Fitch said Cyprus would need an additional €4 billion to support its banks and the downgrade was mainly due to the exposure of Bank of Cyprus, Cyprus Popular Bank and Hellenic Bank, Cyprus's three largest banks, to the Greek financial crisis.
slo: V začetku 21. stoletja je ciprsko gospodarstvo postalo raznoliko in uspešno. Vendar jo je leta 2012 prizadela finančna in bančna kriza v euroobmočju. Junija 2012 je ciprska vlada napovedala, da bo potrebovala 1,8 milijarde EUR tuje pomoči za podporo Cyprus Popular Bank, temu pa je sledilo znižanje bonitetne ocene Cipra na status junk. Fitch je dejal, da bi Ciper potreboval dodatne 4 milijarde EUR za podporo svojim bankam, znižanje ocene pa je bilo predvsem posledica izpostavljenosti treh največjih ciprskih bank Bank of Cyprus, Cyprus Popular Bank in Hellenic Bank, zaradi grške finančne krize.

eng: What affected the Cypriot economy in 2012?
slo: Kaj je vplivalo na ciprsko gospodarstvo v letu 2012?

eng: Eurozone financial and banking crisis
slo: Finančna in bančna kriza v euroobmočju

eng: How much many did the Cypriot government initially announce it needed?
slo: Koliko jih je ciprska vlada naznanila, da jih je potrebovala?

eng: €1.8 billion
slo: 1,8 milijarde EUR

eng: What was the amount of additional money requested by Cyprus?
slo: Kolikšen je bil znesek dodatnega denarja, ki ga je zahteval Ciper?

eng: €4 billion
slo: 4 milijarde EUR

eng: What are the names of Cyprus' three largest banks?
slo: Kakšna so imena treh največjih ciprskih bank?

eng: Bank of Cyprus, Cyprus Popular Bank and Hellenic Bank
slo: Bank of Cyprus, Cyprus Popular Bank in Hellenic Bank

eng: The record transfer fee for a Premier League player has risen steadily over the lifetime of the competition. Prior to the start of the first Premier League season Alan Shearer became the first British player to command a transfer fee of more than £3 million. The record rose steadily in the Premier League's first few seasons, until Alan Shearer made a record breaking £15 million move to Newcastle United in 1996. The three highest transfer in the sport's history had a Premier League club on the selling end, with Tottenham Hotspur selling Gareth Bale to Real Madrid for £85 million in 2013, Manchester United's sale of Cristiano Ronaldo to Real Madrid for £80 million in 2009, and Liverpool selling Luis Suárez to Barcelona for £75 million in 2014.
slo: Pristojbina za prenos rekordov za igralca Premier League se je ves čas tekmovanja stalno povečevala. Pred začetkom prve sezone Premier League Alan Shearer je postal prvi britanski igralec, ki je poveljeval proviziji za prenos več kot 3 milijone £. Rekord se je stalno povečeval v prvih sezonah lige Premier League, dokler ni Alan Shearer leta 1996 dosegel rekordnih 15 milijonov funtov v Newcastle United. Trije najvišji prenosi v zgodovini športa so imeli klub Premier League na prodajnem koncu, pri čemer je Tottenham Hotspur prodal Gareth Bale Real Madridu za 85 milijonov £ v letu 2013, Manchester United je prodal Cristiano Ronaldo Real Madridu za 80 milijonov £ leta 2009, Liverpool pa je leta 2014 prodal Luis Suárez Barceloni za 75 milijonov £.

eng: Have transfer fees been increasing over the past years?
slo: Ali so se pristojbine za prenos v zadnjih letih zviševale?

eng: The record transfer fee for a Premier League player has risen steadily over the lifetime of the competition.
slo: Pristojbina za prenos rekordov za igralca Premier League se je ves čas tekmovanja stalno povečevala.
